sentences.en: Conclusion To treat ovulatory dysfunctional infertility by tonifying kidney and regulating menstruation has its advantage.
sentences.cn: 结论补肾调经法可促排卵、调节内分泌功能,可调整月经周期并提高受孕率.

sentences.en: Dysfunctional conflicts: Conflicts that prevent a group from achieving its goals.
sentences.cn: 消极冲突: 妨碍工作群体实现目标的冲突.

sentences.en: Dysfunctional uterine bleeding is a disease , and occur at any age in gynecopathy.
sentences.cn: 功能性子宫出血(功血)是发生在任何年龄的一种妇科常见病.

sentences.en: Endocrine disorders are common gynecologic diseases, including dysfunctional uterine bleeding, dysmenorrhea, amenorrhea, PCOS and so on.
sentences.cn: 妇科内分泌疾病是常见病, 包括功能失调性子宫出血 、 痛经 、 闭经及多囊卵巢综合征,等等.

sentences.en: Family therapy ( Stair Model ) was selected to deal with their root problem in dysfunctional communication pattern.
sentences.cn: 沙维雅模式的家庭治疗被选取以改善他们的不良沟通.

sentences.en: Object: Dysfunctional uterine bleeding DUB is a common disease in Gynecology and obstetrics department.
sentences.cn: 目的: 功血是妇产科的常见病,多发病.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore and contributive factors of dysfunctional attitudes in first - onset depressive adolescents.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨首发的青少年抑郁症患者功能失调性态度.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the clinical effect of mifepristone on dysfunctional uterine bleeding during peri - menopausal period.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察米非司酮治疗围绝经期功能性子宫出血的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of marvelon and estrogen in treating puberty dysfunctional uterine bleeding.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨妈富隆与雌激素对青春期功能失调性子宫出血(功血)的治疗效果.

sentences.en: The scan shown here indicates dysfunctional metabolism and blood flow in the brain's emotional center.
sentences.cn: 图示造影显示抑郁症患者大脑的情感区出现了代谢障碍.

sentences.en: They know how easily group process can become dysfunctional.
sentences.cn: 他们知道群体作用会多么容易使机能失调.

sentences.en: Whether it's demons or some holdover from a dysfunctional childhood, he cannot stand to be alone.
sentences.cn: 不知是天生如此还是受到不幸孩提时代的影响, 他无法忍受独自一人.

sentences.en: Worse , credit markets , already dysfunctional, were brought close to breaking point.
sentences.cn: 更糟的是, 已经运转不良的信贷市场濒临瓦解.

sentences.en: You've got to hand it to the Hawks, currently the most dysfunctional team in the NBA.
sentences.cn: 你不得不把输家这个词送给鹰队, 因为现在它是NBA里最有问题的球队.
